mapper.update: update checklist_templates set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onboarding_template_id = #{onboardingTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where checklist_template_id = #{checklistTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select checklist_template_id, company_id, onboarding_template_id, name, stage, sort_order, status, created_at, updated_at from checklist_templates where checklist_template_id = #{checklistTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select checklist_template_id, company_id, onboarding_template_id, name, stage, sort_order, status, created_at, updated_at from checklist_templates
